title: being creative, graphic design & working with the gals
itunes:title: being creative, graphic design & working with the gals
description:
Brooke and Danielle are joined by their right-hand-gal, Emma!  Emma is the creative director of all things Gals on The Go, a graphic designer and an artist.  The gals talk to Emma about how she got started, advice for others getting started in graphic design and so much more.  Brooke and Danielle also discuss their cabin weekend (couples trip!).   Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies/stories!


Emma (ESM Creative) Instagram https://www.instagram.com/esm.creative/
Emma (ESM Creative) Website https://www.emmamcgoldrick.com/links/ 

SHOP GOTG MERCH! *NEW COLLECTION NOW AVAILABLE* https://fanjoy.co/collections/gals-on-the-go

Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/
